core

Class Complex

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Complex
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Matrix

    public class Complex
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a complex number, with real and imaginary coefficients

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Complex()
      Constructor for a complex number
      Complex(Complex original)
      Constructs a complex number using another complex number
      Complex(double real)
      Constructs a complex number using only a real part.
      Complex(double real, double imag)
      Constructs a complex number using real and imaginary parts

        Constructor for a complex number

      • Complex

        public Complex(Complex original)
        Constructs a complex number using another complex number
        Parameters:
        original - the complex number used to create the new complex number

      • Complex

        public Complex(double real)
        Constructs a complex number using only a real part. The imaginary part becomes 0.
        Parameters:
        real - the value of the real part of the complex number

      • Complex

        public Complex(double real,
       double imag)
        Constructs a complex number using real and imaginary parts
        Parameters:
        real - the value of the real part of the complex number
        imag - the value of the imaginary part of the complex number
